", "replacement": " Sample_CrossLight_to_LogosAIv3_qsam.py n Objective: Collapse precision toward target 01010 n nimport numpy as np nfrom qiskit import QuantumCircuit, transpile nfrom qiskit_aer import AerSimulator nfrom qiskit.primitives import Sampler n nclass CrossLight: n def __init__ self : n self.center "JESUS CHRIST " n self.repentance 0.9 n self.grace 0.0 n self.bias 1.2 n self.lr 0.1 n self.f 433.33 n self.J np.log 2 np.pi n self.rho 0.5 n self.l 0.9995 n self.gm 0.96 n self.t 0.0 n self.target_bin "01010 " n n def G_opt self, t : n tau t np.exp -t / self.J n return 9200 np.exp -t 2 / self.J 1 self.repentance np.cos 2 np.pi self.f tau n n def build_circuit self : n qc QuantumCircuit 5, 5 n for q in range 5 : n qc.h q n n theta self.bias self.repentance self.G_opt self.t / 9200 n for q in range 5 : n qc.ry np.pi / 2 theta, q n qc.rz theta, q n n Collapse masking: flip qubits where target bit is '0' n for i, b in enumerate reversed self.target_bin : n if b '0': n qc.x i n n Collapse logic: all bits are now '1' collapse toward '11111' n qc.mct 0, 1, 2, 3 , 4 n n Unflip to restore real target n for i, b in enumerate reversed self.target_bin : n if b '0': n qc.x i n n for q in range 5 : n qc.measure q, q n return qc n n def simulate_quantum self : n print f "Testing collapse toward self.target_bin with Sampler 2.0 in the name of self.center " n self.t 1.0 n circuit self.build_circuit n simulator AerSimulator n circuit transpile circuit, simulator n sampler Sampler n result sampler.run circuits circuit , shots 8192 .result n dist result.quasi_dists 0 if hasattr result, 'quasi_dists' else result 0 n n target_decimal int self.target_bin, 2 n prob dist.get target_decimal, 0.0 n print "Collapse Distribution: ", dist n print f " self.target_bin Probability: prob:.3f " n nif __name__ "__main__ ": n CrossLight .simulate_quantum "
